src:
Alasan Rahim Soekasah Tak Ikut Walk Out dari KLB PSSI
02 Nov 2019, 15:29 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Rahim Soekasah memilih tidak menarik diri dari Kongres Luar Biasa (KLB) PSSI yang digelar di Shangri-La Hotel, Jakarta, Sabtu (2/11/2019). Bersama Arif Putra Wicaksono, dia mengikuti rangkaian kongres hingga selesai.
Sebelumnya, ada enam calon ketua umum yang memilih meninggalkan arena kongres karena diusir Sekjen PSSI, Ratu Tisha. Menyusul adanya friksi saat para kandidat hendak melakukan interupsi.
Rahim Soekasah juga menegaskan bahwa dirinya tidak mengikuti sikap dari rekannya di Koalisi PSSI Baru Menuju Perubahan karena dia maju atas nama pribadi. Meski sebelumnya dia ikut hadir dalam deklarasi.
"Saya tidak mau ikut begituan, saya kan maju untuk saya sendiri," ungkap Rahim Soekasah kepada awak media.
Soal kehadirannya dalam deklarasi Koalisi PSSI Baru Menuju Perubahan, dia mengatakan karena diundang. Dia dimintai saran karena dianggap sosok yang lebih senior dari caketum yang lain.

Scroll ke bawah untuk informasi selengkapnya ya Bolaneters
text:
The reason Rahim Soekasah Did Not Walk Out of the PSSI KLB
02 Nov 2019, 15:29 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Rahim Soekasah chose not to withdraw from the PSSI Extraordinary Congress (KLB) which was held at the Shangri-La Hotel, Jakarta, Saturday (11/2/2019). Together with Arif Putra Wicaksono, he followed the series of congresses to the end.
Previously, there were six general chairperson candidates who chose to leave the congress arena because they were expelled by the PSSI Secretary General, Ratu Tisha. Following the friction when the candidates want to interrupt.
Rahim Soekasah also stressed that he did not follow the attitude of his colleagues in the New PSSI Coalition Towards Change because he was advancing on his own behalf. Although before he was present at the declaration.
"I don't want to go along like that, I'm going forward for myself," Rahim Soekasah told the media crew.
About his presence in the declaration of the New PSSI Coalition Towards Change, he said because he was invited. He was asked for advice because he was considered a figure who was more senior than the others.
